{/* First Row */}
Dr. Rajeshwari Devi
The Department of Computer Engineering was established in 1993 with intake of 90 students. The department has good infrastructure with well- established laboratories. The department has experienced and dedicated faculties who give personal attention to each individual student. The department emphasizes on effective teaching learning process including project-based learning using modern tools and technologies implementing updated Curriculum. {isExpanded ? ( <>

} />
{/* Second Row */}
Library- The institute has a library with a huge collection of books, periodicals, journals, CDs, non-book materials and magazines. The library is well equipped with modern facilities and resources in the forms one CDs, DVDs, E-journals, patents etc apart from the usual collection of books.
Hostels- There is a boy hostel beside the college with capacity for 440 and a girl hostel built internally in the college with capacity for 80. All hostels are well built, clean and provide hygienic food. Besides hostels have round the clock electric and water supply.
Laboratories- Laboratories are maintained and monitored by laboratory assistants. Besides the institute has a computer centre equipped with 25 desktop computers with 10 KVA-UPS, Printer, DLP, Design software, etc. Besides the institute has Mechanical Workshop, Engineering Workshop to teach students and help them gain hands-on training in Mechanical engineering.
Health Centre- To cope up with everyday life stress and life style diseases, the institute offers a health centre equipped with modern equipment like Tread mill, Manual Tread Mill, Weighing Machine, Gym ball etc.
Sports Facility- The institute has both indoor and outdoor sports facility to nurture the idea of overall well-being of students both mentally and physically. The institute has football grounds, basketball courts, badminton courts where students practice regularly. Besides the institute arranges Annual Sports Day every year where students and faculties take active participation.
